name: Off Now
description:
Match-up in-house shooter!!!

　Shots rebound on the walls in the house and hit your enemy!!!

　Fute&Kuma's Head-to-head match-up!!!
　Match-up all over the world!!!
　The synchronized twin collision judgeing system is developed more!!!
　The new function 'Synchro move' enables you almost not feel communication delay on the screen.

　You'll be waowao on Kumakku's stages.

　The fin of four-part series of Fute&Kuma!!!
